ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_women] Hello everyone
ygData.msgSnippet: I remember you!  I have played through a bizillion alts in my lifetime (sigh). Anyway, the good news about rangers is how bad the rep is.  I play a ranger on
ygData.messageBody:
I remember you!  I have played through a bizillion alts in my lifetime (sigh). 
 
Anyway, the good news about rangers is how bad the rep is.  I play a ranger on TP, the new server.  At 12 I got an Ebony Blade because I was the only ranger anyone in the group knew.  Another one went up on the boards because no one in that group knew any rangers ;-) 
 
I play, when possible which it hasn't been in forever, with a now 55 ranger on Brell (sylvanar, I play Iceiallana, a 54 druid).  He has no trouble getting groups anymore.  A lot of the flack is over and it has turned into a huge joke.   I get some grief for being a ranger, but there are only 22 of us on the new server (giggles) and since casters outnumber tanks 3:1 now, anyone who can tank is wanted for groups.
 
As for kicking the habit, congratulatoins.  I've come close twice but never succeeded.  <sigh>
 
Lahstia, the lost ranger on Tholuxe Paells
Dnaice, wizard from Quellious (long long ago)
Dnaisha, Iceiallana, Cerres, Caedusia, from Brell
